snippet: Joseph C. Massino, the former leader of the Bonanno crime family, avoided the death penalty by helping investigators.
abstract: Federal prosecutors file a rare motion requesting reduction of life sentence of Joseph C Massino, Bonanno organized crime family leader who helped with investigation and prosecution of other mob members; decision on length of revised prison term for Massino is up to Judge Nicholas G Garaufis, who is scheduled to hear the request on June 20.
lead_paragraph: Joseph C. Massino, the former leader of the Bonanno crime family, avoided the death penalty by helping investigators.

headline.seo: U.S. Requests Shorter Term for Mob Boss Sentenced to Life
headline.main: U.S. Requests Shorter Term for Mob Boss Sentenced to Life
headline.print_headline: U.S. Requests Shorter Term For Mob Boss Sentenced to Life
